name: Spirit of Serene Fire
effect: b"On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards.\r\nLineage Release \xe2\x80\x94 Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
flavor_text: b'Searing insight found within all-consuming flame.'

name: Spirit of Serene Water
effect: b"On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. \nLineage Release \xe2\x80\x94 Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
flavor_text: b'Overflowing visions immersed within the waves.'

name: Spirit of Serene Wind
effect: b"On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. \nLineage Release \xe2\x80\x94 Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
flavor_text: b"Cunning intuition trapped within the vortex's eye.

name: Merlin, Kingslayer
effect: b"Merlin Lineage\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, put a level counter on Merlin. Then, if there's an even amount of level counters on Merlin, draw a card and Merlin's attacks get +2 power until end of turn.

name: Merlin, Kingslayer
effect: b"Merlin Lineage\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, put a level counter on Merlin. Then, if there's an even amount of level counters on Merlin, draw a card and Merlin's attacks get +2 power until end of turn.

name: Merlin, Kingslayer
effect: b"Merlin Lineage\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, put a level counter on Merlin. Then, if there's an even amount of level counters on Merlin, draw a card and Merlin's attacks get +2 power until end of turn.

name: Azure Protective Trinket
effect: b'Banish Azure Protective Trinket: Banish up to three target fire element cards from a single graveyard.'
flavor_text: b'An enchanted pendant that provides soothing relief from the scorching summer heat.'

name: Crimson Protective Trinket
effect: b'Banish Crimson Protective Trinket: Target opponent reveals two cards at random from their memory. Banish each wind element card revealed this way.'
flavor_text: b'A magical armlet that channels and disperses galestorm winds into a pleasant puff of air.'

name: Quicksilver Grail
effect: b'Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)\nOn Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down.\nBanish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card. (You still pay for its costs.)'

name: Tariff Ring
effect: b"Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 2for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.
flavor_text: b'If profits are to be made, bring enough to share.'

name: Tithe Proclamation
effect: b"On Enter: Draw a card.\nEach player can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game.
flavor_text: b'Wealth can only be amassed up to a certain point before the church of Aesa takes an interest. '

name: Viridian Protective Trinket
effect: b'During your turn, water element cards your opponents activate cost 2 more to activate.'
flavor_text: b'A charmed ring that funnels and tapers torrential downpours into a revitalizing mist.'

name: Beastsoul Visage
effect: b'Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nLinked ally gets +2 power, has pride 3, and is a Beast in addition to its other types.'
flavor_text: b'Even a small mutt can be made to look like a ferocious beast.'

name: Explosive Rune
effect: b'Banish Explosive Rune: Deal 1 damage to target ally. Class Bonus: If that ally is attacking, deal 2 damage to it instead.'
flavor_text: b'The labrynthine catacombs of Varuck are littered with both inventions and victims of mad wizards.'

name: Firetongue
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Attack: You may banish a fire element card from your graveyard. If you do, put a durability counter on Firetongue.'
flavor_text: b"A serrated blade forged from a dragon's fang. Only dragonsbreath can maintain its edge.

name: Varuckan Soulknife
effect: b'[Class Bonus] [Element Bonus] You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard to activate this card from your material deck.\n[Class Bonus] On Kill: Put a card named Varuckan Soulknife from your banishment into your material deck.'

name: Arondight, Azure Blade
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: You may banish any amount of cards with floating memory from your graveyard. For each card banished this way, put a refinement counter on Arondight. \nArondight gets +2 power for each refinement counter on it.'

name: Cloak of Stillwater
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. \nREST, Banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn.'
flavor_text: b'Weaved with the illusory gossamer of Stillwater.'

name: Wand of Frost
effect: b"[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card.\nBanish Wand of Frost: Target unit's attacks get -3 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: b'Wielded by the apostles of the Lumina Sanctuary, this wand chills even the most heated of threats.'

name: Wildheart Lyre
effect: b'Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.) \n[Class Bonus] Whenever you rest Wildheart Lyre to pay for the reserve cost of a Harmony or Melody activation, put a buff counter on an Animal or Beast ally you control.'

name: Effigy of Gaia
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.\nWhenever an opponent activates an attack card with cleave, Animal and Beast allies you control get +2 life until end of turn. '

name: Ventus, Staff of Zephyrs
effect: b'Whenever you activate a wind element Mage Spell, put a refinement counter on Ventus. \nREST, Remove a refinement counter from Ventus: Put an enlighten counter on your champion. \nREST, Remove three refinement counters from Ventus: Suppress target ally.'

name: Windwalker Boots
effect: b'[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, if your champion is awake, put a preparation counter on them.\nBanish Windwalker Boots: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has five or more preparation counters on them.'

name: Zephyr's Edge
effect: b"[Class Bonus] On Enter: If it's not your materialize phase, Zephyr's Edge gets +1 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: b'Lighter than the breeze, swifter than the wind.'

name: The Majestic Spirit
effect: b'Intercept, True Sight, Vigor\nChampions you control have spellshroud.\nIf another crux element unit you control would take damage, prevent half of that damage, rounded up.'

name: The Majestic Spirit
effect: b'Intercept, True Sight, Vigor\nChampions you control have spellshroud.\nIf another crux element unit you control would take damage, prevent half of that damage, rounded up.'

name: Fractured Crown
effect: b"Champion Link (This object enters the field linked to target champion. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nLinked champion's first attack each turn gets +2 power. Class Bonus: That champion also gets +2 life for each unique ally card in your graveyard.

name: Covenant of Thorns
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nAlly Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nIf damage would be dealt to your champion, that damage is dealt to linked ally instead.'

name: Bedivere, Woodland Overseer
effect: b'Bedivere has taunt as long as you control another Animal or Beast ally.\n[Class Bonus] [Level 3+] On Death: Put a buff counter on each Animal and/or Beast ally you control.'
flavor_text: b'"Who dares to threaten the wilds?"'

name: Bedivere, Woodland Overseer
effect: b'Bedivere has taunt as long as you control another Animal or Beast ally.\n[Class Bonus] [Level 3+] On Death: Put a buff counter on each Animal and/or Beast ally you control.'
flavor_text: b'"Who dares to threaten the wilds?"'

name: Blanche, Sheltering Saint
effect: b'[Level 2+] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)\nIf another unit you control would be dealt non-attack damage, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards in your memory.'

name: Blanche, Sheltering Saint
effect: b'[Level 2+] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)\nIf another unit you control would be dealt non-attack damage, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards in your memory.'

name: Capricious Lynx
effect: b"Pride 4 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher.)\n[Class Bonus] On Enter: Capricious Lynx loses all abilities until end of turn.
flavor_text: b'Quick to action, quicker to defiance.'

name: Cunning Broker
effect: b"Stealth(This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)\nREST, Remove two preparation counters from your champion: Draw a card.
flavor_text: b'Handling coins is but second nature.'

name: Dawn of Ashes
effect: b'Upkeep \xe2\x80\x94 At the beginning of your recollection phase, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is not norm element, sacrifice Dawn of Ashes.\nNon-norm element cards cost 1 more to activate.'

name: Develop Mana
effect: b'Put a level counter on your champion. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)'
flavor_text: b'From enlightenment comes transcendance.'

name: Fast Cure
effect: b"If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, recover 4. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)\nFloating Memory
flavor_text: b'A brief respite in dire times may give enough focus to birth a plan.'

name: Fractal of Insight
effect: b'On Enter: You may rest Fractal of Insight. If you do, glimpse 2.\nReservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.) '
flavor_text: b'An enigma that defies, and yet, shapes reality.'

name: Gawain, Chivalrous Thief
effect: b"[Level 2+] True Sight\n[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: You may sacrifice Gawain. If you do, look at that opponent's memory and discard a card from it.
flavor_text: b'A master spy and notorious thief who never misses.'

name: Gentle Respite
effect: b"If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, draw a card into your memory. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)\nFloating Memory

name: Imperious Highlander
effect: b'On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X power until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.'
flavor_text: b'Against all odds and against an insurmountable front, there can be only one answer.'

name: Lancelot, Goliath of Aesa
effect: b'Hindered (This ally enters the field rested.) \n[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Lancelot gets +2 life.\nOn Attack: You may pay 3. If you do, Lancelot gets +3 power until end of turn.'
flavor_text: b'"I greet the burden of a thousand lives..."'

name: Lancelot, Goliath of Aesa
effect: b'Hindered (This ally enters the field rested.) \n[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Lancelot gets +2 life.\nOn Attack: You may pay 3. If you do, Lancelot gets +3 power until end of turn.'
flavor_text: b'"I greet the burden of a thousand lives..."'

name: Lurking Assailant
effect: b"Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake.\n[Level 1+] Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.
flavor_text: b'Some assassins prove their skill with a dagger, others prove it with a glib tongue and twisted schemes.'

name: Morgan, Soul Guide
effect: b"[Level 1+] Prevent all non-attack damage that would be dealt to Morgan.\n[Level 2+] Your opponents can't recover.\n[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may glimpse 1. If you don't, recover 1.

name: Morgan, Soul Guide
effect: b"[Level 1+] Prevent all non-attack damage that would be dealt to Morgan.\n[Level 2+] Your opponents can't recover.\n[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may glimpse 1. If you don't, recover 1.

name: Ordinary Bear
effect: b"Pride 2 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 2 or higher.)\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Peaceful Reunion
effect: b"Activate this card only if you have not declared an attack this turn.\nUntil the beginning of your next turn, you and target player can't declare attacks. Banish Peaceful Reunion.

name: Prismatic Sanctuary
effect: b'Upkeep \xe2\x80\x94 At the beginning of your recollection phase, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is not fire, water, nor wind element, sacrifice Prismatic Sanctuary.\nFire, water, and wind elements are enabled for you.'

name: Resolute Stand
effect: b'[Level 2+] You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.\nIf target unit would be dealt attack damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.'
flavor_text: b'"...with boundless resolve and forsakenness."'

name: Right of Realm
effect: b'Whenever you activate a domain card, you may sacrifice Right of Realm. If you do, that domain enters the field without any of its upkeep abilities.\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)'

name: Scavenging Raccoon
effect: b'On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.'
flavor_text: b'Looters have conditioned these diligent creatures to scavenge the battlefield for any source of glint or glitter in exchange for a treat.'

name: Seeking Shot
effect: b"[Level 2+] True Sight\n[Class Bonus] Seeking Shot can't be retaliated.\nAs long as the attacker is attacking a Human ally, Seeking Shot gets +3 power.
flavor_text: b'Those hit seldom kow where the shot came from.'

name: Stalwart Shieldmate
effect: b"Taunt (While awake, this ally must be targeted before other units you control during your oppent's attack declarations if able.)\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
editions: Alchemical Revolution Starter Decks 1 b'Rachel Liu'

name: Steady Verse
effect: b'[Class Bonus] The next Harmony action card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate. \nDraw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b'A rousing allegro before the crescendo.'

name: Thieving Cut
effect: b'Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.)\nOn Hit: If Thieving Cut was prepared, draw a card.'
flavor_text: b"What's yours is mine.

name: Blazing Bowman
effect: b"Blazing Bowman's attacks can't be retaliated.\nOn Enter: You may banish a fire element card from your graveyard. If you do, Blazing Bowman gets +2 power until end of turn.

name: Corhazi Arsonist
effect: b'Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Corhazi Arsonist gains stealth until end of turn.\nIf a unit hit by Corhazi Arsonist this turn would die, banish it instead.'

name: Flamebreak Chorus
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)\r\nTarget ally gets +2 power until end of turn. If it's defending, wake it up, and it gets an additional +LV power until end of turn.

name: Hone by Fire
effect: b'Target Sword weapon you control gets +2 power until end of turn. Class Bonus: Put a durability counter on it.'
flavor_text: b'Enwreathed and tempered in flame.'

name: Incendiary Fractal
effect: b"On Enter: Deal 2 damage to target ally you don't control. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to that ally instead.\nReservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Innervate Fury
effect: b"As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.)\nDeal 7 damage split among any amount of target allies.

name: Red Slime
effect: b"Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.)\n[Class Bonus] On Death: Deal damage to all allies equal to Red Slime's power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Varuckan Acolyte
effect: b'On Enter: Destroy target regalia with memory cost 0. \n[Level 3+] Varuckan Acolyte gets +3 power.'
flavor_text: b'Some of the cabalistic rituals practiced among the mad cultists require material sacrifice.'

name: Corhazi Trapper
effect: b"On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion.\nREST, Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Target unit's attacks get -3 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: b'Well-placed traps to turn the tide.'

name: Deep Sea Fractal
effect: b'Hindered (This object enters the field rested.) \nOn Enter: Each player puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard.\nReservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.) '

name: Fractal of Intrusion
effect: b"On Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. When you do, look at target opponent's memory and discard a card from it.\nReservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Fracturize
effect: b'Target item or weapon becomes a Cleric Fractal phantasia with reservable and loses all other abilities. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)\nFloating Memory'
flavor_text: b'"You\'d stand a better chance fighting without them."'

name: Frostbind
effect: b'Negate target card activation unless its controller pays 2. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.'
flavor_text: b'"O\'Lumina who shelters us, bind those who seek us harm in frost. Grant us peace under your blessing."'

name: Frostbinder Apostle
effect: b"Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)\n[Level 2+] On Enter: Target rested ally you don't control gets -4 life until end of turn.

name: Guarded Dissipation
effect: b'Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn where X is the greatest power among Sword weapons you control. \n[Level 1+] Draw a card.'
flavor_text: b'An impeccible parry to nullify any assault.'

name: Innervate Knowledge
effect: b"As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.)\nDraw two cards.

name: Ocean's Blessing
effect: b'Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nLinked ally gets +1 life and has taunt.\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory'

name: Protective Fractal
effect: b'Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.) \nREST: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target champion this turn.'

name: Refracting Missile
effect: b'Deal damage to target unit equal to the amount of Fractals you control plus 1.\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)'

name: Riptide Slash
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)\nOn Kill: You may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard.'

name: Song of Frost
effect: b"[Class Bonus] You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost.\nIf a unit is attacking, end the combat phase. (As a phase ends, banish all triggers, activations, and materializations on the effects stack.)

name: Anthem of Vitality
effect: b"Target Animal or Beast ally gets +3 life and gains spellshroud until end of turn.\nHarmonize \xe2\x80\x94 If you've activated a Melody card this turn, put two buff counters on an Animal or Beast ally you control.
flavor_text: b"Gaia's anthem invigorates the woodland.

name: Corhazi Outlook
effect: b"On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion.\n[Class Bonus] Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Opponents can't activate cards this turn. Glimpse 1. Activate this ability only during your turn.

name: Dematerialize
effect: b"Return target regalia to its owner's material deck.
flavor_text: b"Things worn and torn need not be spurned\r\nto ash and dust. They'll be returned\r\nwith new life and purpose earned.

name: Displace
effect: b"Banish target ally, then return it to the field under its owner's control rested.\n[Class Bonus] Put an enlighten counter on your champion.
flavor_text: b'"Oh my. Be careful where you land."'

name: Green Slime
effect: b"Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.)On Enter: Put two buff counters on Green Slime.\n[Class Bonus] On Leave: Put the buff counters that were on Green Slime on target ally you control.

name: Innervate Agility
effect: b"As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.)\nUnits you control gain your choice of stealth or spellshroud until end of turn.

name: Intrepid Spearman
effect: b'[Level 1+] If attack damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. Apply this replacement effect only once per turn.'
flavor_text: b'A master lancer, trained to deflect even projectiles.'

name: Mark of Fervor
effect: b'Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\nLinked ally gets +1 power and +1 life, and has vigor.'
flavor_text: b"Through powerful bonds, one's inner strength can freely flourish.

name: Parcenet, Royal Maid
effect: b"[Level 2+] Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)\nREST: Glimpse 1. Reveal the top card of your deck. When you reveal a wind element card this way, another target ally you control gains stealth until end of turn.

name: Rally the Peasants
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 3 less to activate if an opponent controls three or more allies.\nLook at the top six cards of your deck. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.'

name: Scatter Essence
effect: b'Destroy target phantasia.\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)'
flavor_text: b'"Invasive hexes will not be tolerated within this castle."'

name: Windrider Invoker
effect: b'On Enter: You may remove two enlighten counters from your champion. If you do, draw a card and Windrider Invoker gets +3 power until end of turn.'
flavor_text: b'A burst of wind to dash through the battlefield. Another to take down the enemy.'

name: Shock Therapy
effect: b'[Class Bonus] [Element Bonus] Whenever this card is banished from your memory, put an enlighten counter on your champion.\nDeal an amount of damage to target ally equal to the amount of enlighten counters on your champion.'

name: Voltaic Sphere
effect: b'Deal 3 damage to target unit. If that unit is an ally, deal 5 damage to it instead. \n[Class Bonus] Banish Voltaic Sphere from your graveyard: The next arcane element Spell card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate.'

name: Incarnate Majesty
effect: b'[Class Bonus] EfficiencyThe Majestic Spirit from your material deck or banishment onto the field.'

name: Slay the King
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Attack: You may banish a card from your material deck. If you do, Slay the King gains "On Kill: You may play the banished card."'
flavor_text: b'Treachery strikes deadliest in the heart.'

name: Illuminate Secrets
effect: b"Deal an amount of damage to target unit equal to its owner's influence minus your influence. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)
flavor_text: b'The light protects those unjustly oppressed.'

name: Uther, Illustrious King
effect: b"Intercept, Vigor\nOn Enter: You may rest Uther. When you do, banish another target non-champion object.\nOn Leave: Return the banished object to the field under its owner's control rested.

name: Avatar of Gaia
effect: b'Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)\n[Class Bonus] Preserve\nLinked ally has taunt and loses pride.'
flavor_text: b"Even the king of beasts rallied to Gaia's presence.

name: Kraal, Stonescale Tyrant
effect: b'As an additional cost to activate this card, banish two preserved cards from your material deck.\nIntercept, Spellshroud, True Sight, Vigor\n[Class Bonus] On Attack: Reveal the top two cards of your deck and put them into your material deck preserved. '

name: Kraal, Stonescale Tyrant
effect: b'As an additional cost to activate this card, banish two preserved cards from your material deck.\nIntercept, Spellshroud, True Sight, Vigor\n[Class Bonus] On Attack: Reveal the top two cards of your deck and put them into your material deck preserved. '
